This section covers donated example configurations and config techniques.
XML/Automation Scripts:
* [[Commit Scripts]] * [[Op Scripts]] * [[Event Scripts]]
Protocol configurations: * [[MPLS]]: The Multiprotocol Label Switching basic configuration example.
Layer 3 VPNs with MPLS * [[L3VPN]]: Layer 3 VPNs with MPLS
Quality of Service: * [[L2TP QOS]]: Quality of Service for E-Series (JUNOSe) L2TP LNS
LAN to WAN NAT and port forwarding * [http://remcobressers.nl/2008/07/configuring-nat-on-juniper-j-series/ NAT/PAT]: Configuring Network Address Translation and Port Translation on M and J-series.
SNMP configurations: * [[ERX Subscriber Management]]: Managing subscribers using SNMP.
cflowd / Netflow configurations: * [[cflowd configuration]]: How to setup cflowd/netflow exports on Juniper Routers
Cluster configurations: * [[J series routing clusters]]
Packet based forwarding vs. flow based forwarding: * [[enabling packet based forwarding]]
Simple Policing: * [[simple policing]]
DHCP: * [[DHCP]]
syslog: * [[syslog]]
